1.name: Gladiator
1.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

2.name: American Psycho
2.description: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

3.name: Requiem for a Dream
3.description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

4.name: Snatch
4.description: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

5.name: Malèna
5.description: Amidst the war climate, a teenage boy discovering himself becomes love-stricken by Malèna, a sensual woman living in a small, narrow-minded Italian town.

6.name: Coyote Ugly
6.description: Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.

7.name: Cast Away
7.description: A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

8.name: Scary Movie
8.description: A year after disposing of the body of a man they accidentally killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.

9.name: Charlie's Angels
9.description: Three women, detectives with a mysterious boss, retrieve stolen voice-ID software, using martial arts, tech skills, and sex appeal.

10.name: Memento
10.description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

11.name: X-Men
11.description: In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.

12.name: Road Trip
12.description: Four college buddies embark on a road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a female friend.

13.name: The Patriot
13.description: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

14.name: Unbreakable
14.description: A man learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.

15.name: Almost Famous
15.description: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

16.name: The Cell
16.description: An F.B.I. Agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.

17.name: Remember the Titans
17.description: The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

18.name: Scream 3
18.description: While Sidney and her friends visit the Hollywood set of Stab 3, the third film based on the Woodsboro murders, another Ghostface killer rises to terrorize them.

19.name: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
19.description: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.

20.name: The Replacements
20.description: During a pro football strike, the owners hire substitute players.

21.name: Bring It On
21.description: A champion high school cheerleading squad discovers its previous captain stole all their best routines from an inner-city school and must scramble to compete at this year's championships.

22.name: Final Destination
22.description: After a teenager has a terrifying vision of him and his friends dying in a plane crash, he prevents the accident only to have Death hunt them down, one by one.

23.name: Shaft
23.description: New York City police detective John Shaft (nephew of the original 1970s detective) goes on a personal mission to make sure the son of a real estate tycoon is brought to justice after a racially-motivated murder.

24.name: Wo hu cang long
24.description: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.

25.name: Dude, Where's My Car?
25.description: Two potheads wake up after a night of partying and cannot remember where they parked their car.

26.name: Gone in Sixty Seconds
26.description: A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal fifty cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.

27.name: Hollow Man
27.description: When the leader of a team of scientists volunteers to be the test subject for their experiment in human invisibility, he slowly unravels and turns against them, with horrific consequences.

28.name: Erin Brockovich
28.description: An unemployed single mother becomes a legal assistant and almost single-handedly brings down a California power company accused of polluting a city's water supply.

29.name: Traffic
29.description: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is a crack addict. Two DEA agents protect an informant. A jailed drug baron's wife attempts to carry on the family business.

30.name: Billy Elliot
30.description: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.

31.name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas
31.description: On the outskirts of Whoville, there lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch (Jim Carrey), who plans on ruining Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.

32.name: The Beach
32.description: Vicenarian Richard travels to Thailand and finds himself in possession of a strange map. Rumours state that it leads to a solitary beach paradise, a tropical bliss. Excited and intrigued, he sets out to find it.

33.name: Faa yeung nin wa
33.description: Two neighbors, a woman and a man, form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

34.name: What Lies Beneath
34.description: The wife of a university research scientist believes that her lakeside Vermont home is haunted by a ghost - or that she is losing her mind.

35.name: The Emperor's New Groove
35.description: Emperor Kuzco (David Spade) is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma (Eartha Kitt), and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha (John Goodman), the gentle llama herder.

36.name: Tra(sgre)dire
36.description: While scouting out apartments in London for her Venetian boyfriend, Carla rents an apartment that overlooks the Thames. There she meet the lesbian hyper-horny real estate agent Moira.

37.name: Me, Myself & Irene
37.description: A nice-guy cop with dissociative identity disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates.

38.name: Space Cowboys
38.description: When retired engineer Frank Corvin (Clint Eastwood) is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.

39.name: Battlefield Earth
39.description: It's the year 3000 A.D.; the Earth is lost to the alien race of Psychlos. Humanity is enslaved by these gold-thirsty tyrants, whom are unaware that their 'man-animals' are about to ignite the rebellion of a lifetime.

40.name: Mission: Impossible II
40.description: I.M.F. Agent Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) is sent to Sydney, Australia to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera".

41.name: Quills
41.description: In a Napoleonic era insane asylum, an inmate, the irrepressible Marquis De Sade, fights a battle of wills against a tyrannically prudish doctor.

42.name: The Perfect Storm
42.description: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

43.name: Shadow of the Vampire
43.description: The filming of Nosferatu (1922) is hampered by the fact that its star Max Schreck is taking the role of a vampire far more seriously than seems humanly possible.

44.name: The Family Man
44.description: A fast-lane investment broker, offered the opportunity to see how the other half lives, wakes up to find that his sports car and girlfriend have become a mini-van and wife.

45.name: Miss Congeniality
45.description: An F.B.I. Agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.

46.name: Dracula 2000
46.description: A group of thieves breaks into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.

47.name: Batoru rowaiaru
47.description: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

48.name: The Whole Nine Yards
48.description: A struggling dentist's life is turned upside down when a famous gangster moves in next door, and his wife convinces him to inform a notorious mob boss about the gangster's whereabouts.

49.name: Pitch Black
49.description: A commercial transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night. But then, they learn that a month-long eclipse is about to occur.

50.name: Where the Heart Is
50.description: A pregnant 17-year-old rebuilds her life after being abandoned by her boyfriend at a Wal-Mart in Sequoyah, Oklahoma.
